20110114142154.000|20110114142154.000|CC1|        So now, I've got        
20110114142154.000|20110114142159.000|CC1|        the leading part.       
20110114142159.000|20110114142200.000|CC1|   ADVAIR is clinically proven  
20110114142200.000|20110114142200.000|CC1|  to help significantly improve 
20110114142200.000|20110114142203.000|CC1|         lung function.         
20110114142203.000|20110114142205.000|CC1|  Unlike most COPD medications, 
20110114142205.000|20110114142205.000|CC1|         ADVAIR contains        
20110114142205.000|20110114142208.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20110114142208.000|20110114142208.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20110114142208.000|20110114142210.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20110114142210.000|20110114142211.000|CC1|        working together        
20110114142211.000|20110114142211.000|CC1|         to help improve        
20110114142211.000|20110114142213.000|CC1|   your lung function all day.  
20110114142213.000|20110114142213.000|CC1|      ADVAIR won't replace      
20110114142213.000|20110114142216.000|CC1|      fast-acting inhalers      
20110114142216.000|20110114142217.000|CC1|       for sudden symptoms      
20110114142217.000|20110114142217.000|CC1|     and should not be used     
20110114142217.000|20110114142219.000|CC1|     more than twice a day.     
20110114142219.000|20110114142219.000|CC1|        People with COPD        
20110114142219.000|20110114142221.000|CC1|          taking ADVAIR         
20110114142221.000|20110114142221.000|CC1|        may have a higher       
20110114142221.000|20110114142223.000|CC1|      chance of pneumonia.      
20110114142223.000|20110114142223.000|CC1|    ADVAIR may increase your    
20110114142223.000|20110114142226.000|CC1|      risk of osteoporosis      
20110114142226.000|20110114142227.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.     
20110114142227.000|20110114142227.000|CC1|  Tell your doctor if you have  
20110114142227.000|20110114142230.000|CC1|        a heart condition       
20110114142230.000|20110114142230.000|CC1|     or high blood pressure     
20110114142230.000|20110114142233.000|CC1|      before taking ADVAIR.     
20110114142233.000|20110114142233.000|CC1|     If you're still having     
20110114142233.000|20110114142234.000|CC1|      difficulty breathing,

20110114142422.000|20110114142424.000|CC1|>> YEAH, CHUCK, THAT'S RIGHT.
